item.title: About
item.description: Growing up I was always very curious about technology. I was fortunate enough that from a young age I had access to a PC with the screeching sound of dial up. Yup. I remember it, despite being born in the mid-90s. I played plenty of games, Iâ€™m hard pressed to name any but I remember a Tonka game (maybe Tonka Search Rescue) and a racing game that I have a vague memory of having an issue with.
